text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Boquerón Department | other_name = Departamento de Boquerón | type = Department | image_flag = Flag of Boquerón Department.svg | image_shield = Escudo de Boqueron, Paraguay.PNG | image_map = Boqueron in Paraguay.svg | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Region | established_title = Established | established_date = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Edwin Pauls Friesen (ANR) | seat_type = Capital | seat = Filadelfia | parts_type = Number of Districts | parts_style = para | p1 = 3 | unit_pref = Metric | area_total_km2 = 91669 | population_total = 45617 | population_as_of = 2002 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = AST | utc_offset1 = -04 | timezone1_DST = ADT | utc_offset1_DST = -03 | iso_code = PY-19 }} The Boquerón Department (; ) is a department in the west of Paraguay. The capital is Filadelfia. == Districts == The department has 6 districts: # Filadelfia # Loma Plata # Mariscal Estigarribia # General Eugenio A. Garay # Doctor Pedro P.
